name: twizzler socks
notes:
***this is a lovely simple sock - but with a twist!***

the pattern features slipped stitches to create a ribbed texture, adding interest to solid colours, or behold the colourwork effect that unfolds when used with self-striping yarn! 

it is suitable for beginner sock knitters and experienced ones alike. 

**pattern sizing:**
the sizing given in the pattern fits a women's medium (8.5" circumference, but stretches comfortably to 11"). the length of the sock can be adjusted to fit the wearer.

enjoy!

***update 13/4/2019: pattern now available in dutch! thank you to dieuwkelaroi for translating!*** 

> this pattern has been test knit,
> however if you have any questions, do
> get in touch!
